meanings.definition: A Greek dish consisting of small pieces of meat and sometimes vegetables grilled on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: At the Greek restaurant, I ordered delicious souvlakis for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of souvlakis cooking on the grill filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The souvlakis were so tasty that they danced in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The sizzling sound of the souvlakis on the skewer was music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the golden-brown souvlakis made my stomach growl in anticipation.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various Greek dishes, including souvlakis.
meanings.sent2: We decided to order two souvlakis for our meal.
meanings.sent3: The souvlakis on the plate looked like a small army ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: The souvlakis piled high reminded me of a mountain of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the freshly grilled souvlakis made my mouth water.
